name: The Wild Inside
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #37  - Theme: Inside the Machine

The Github

Controls:

Escape - Releases the mouse

Mouse Movement - Turns Left/Right and Spins Camera Up/Down

Right Mouse Button - Swing Melee

WASD - Moves Player

I hope you enjoy what the team crafted!

The Team:

Kaizar Nike (Programming)

Marrow (Sound)

BeanieBagStreams (Art)
